room_title: Escape room "Sherlock Holmes’ Library" by The Great Escape Room in Akron
review: Dr. Megan Watson helped us have a REALLY good time in the Library room. She explained to us what we were doing and was a pleasant presence during our adventure in trying to escape. No claustrophobia worries. Plenty of room to have fun and excitement as we used our brains.

room_title: Escape room "Sherlock Holmes’ Library" by The Great Escape Room in Akron
review: Our first escape room. We did Sherlock's Library. Our Dr. Watson (Katie) was so nice and helpful; she made it a lot of fun. I would definitely do this again. I do feel we would have had a better chance with 4-6 people (10 sounds a little crowded), so I would recommend bringing a few extra eyeballs.

room_title: Escape room "Sherlock Holmes’ Library" by The Great Escape Room in Akron
review: The Sherlock room was the most challenging one I’ve done yet! We completed it with 3 people and the help of our guide. Madisyn was the best!
